resources.string:
First a cipher needs to be created. Open the menu and select "Add Cipher". Then select the cipher type from the drop down box and give it a name. Press "OK". If a configuration screen appears, configure the Cipher how you would like and press "OK".

From the list you can long press a Cipher to reconfigure or delete it. Select a Cipher from the list to use it.

You will see a text box where you can enter your message. "Encrypt", "Decrypt", and "Back" are self explainatory. Press "Clear" to clear the contents of the text box. Press "Send" to share the message with other apps such as: SMS, GMail, Google Voice, Google Talk, etc...
